content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) with coal as fuel and iron ore as input.
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) with coal as fuel and iron ore as input.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. For example, the error at step 200 indicates that there was no coal available to insert.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
